definition.indonesian: cara mengucapkan suatu kata atau kalimat
definition.english: the way in which a word or language is spoken
definition.japanese: 単語や言語が話される方法

examples.english: His English pronunciation is very good.
examples.japanese: 彼の英語の発音はとても良いです。

examples.indonesian: Saya kesulitan dengan pengucapan kata ini.
examples.english: I'm having trouble with the pronunciation of this word.
examples.japanese: この単語の発音に苦労しています。
examples.korean: 이 단어의 발음에 어려움을 겪고 있습니다.
